original_text: For the jar of flour was not used up and the jug of oil did not run dry, in keeping with the word of the Lord spoken by Elijah.
korean_text: 여호와께서 엘리야를 통하여 하신 말씀 같이 통의 가루가 떨어지지 아니하고 병의 기름이 없어지지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: For the jar of flour was not used up
and the jug of oil did not run dry
in keeping with the word of the Lord
